pages.text: $(li)Bees are flying neutral creatures that can be found near $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/bee_nest)Bee Nests$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/beehive)Beehives$(/l).$(br)$(li)They fly around their nests, and are attracted to flowers, collecting their pollen, except if they are on $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/flower_pot)Flower Pots$(/l).$(br)$(li)Finally Bees fly back into their nests to generate honey.

Bees will attack if you try to collect $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/honeycomb)Honeycomb$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/honey_bottle)Honey$(/l), attacking and $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)poisoning$(/l) you in the process.
